long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trustpilot Reviews Extractor: designed to extract Trustpilot business reviews and company reviews effortlessly. Gain instant access to valuable customer insights that drive informed decision-making and enhance your customer experience.

Effortless Data Extraction
Our intuitive tool simplifies the process of scraping customer reviews, eliminating the need for complex coding or data scraping. With just a few clicks, you can:
1. Open any business page on Trustpilot.com.
2. Click "Download Reviews" beside the review number.
3. Export the structured data file in CSV, JSON, or XLSX (Excel) format from the popup window.
4. (Optional) Click the "AI Review Summary" button for an in-depth analysis of the reviews.

Choose between CSV, JSON, or Excel formats to analyze and share customer feedback seamlessly. Our extension eliminates the need for complex coding or data scraping, empowering you with data-driven insights in seconds.

Unlock a wealth of customer feedback by exporting essential reviewer data, the data Trustpilot Reviews Scraper downloaded including ratings, comments, helpfulness votes, and user information (name, location, photos, etc.). This comprehensive dataset empowers you to make data-driven decisions and identify trends that drive business growth.

AI Review Summary
Gain deeper insights into your customer reviews with our ChatGPT-Powered Review Analysis feature. This cutting-edge technology analyzes the reviews and provides a concise summary of the advantages, disadvantages, potential improvements, and an overall recommendation on whether to buy or not.

E-commerce managers, analysts, and developers rely on our extension to identify customer feedback trends, monitor competitor activity, uncover business opportunities, and enhance the overall customer experience.

Data Privacy 
The data you work with remains confined to your local machine and does not traverse our servers at any point.

Disclaimer
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no association with Trustpilot Inc.
